page.title: 07INDUSTRIAL ESTATES
page.content:
SANDERS LODGE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE.
This light industrial estate is about 25,000 square metres in area and is Rushden's main commercial and industrial complex.The estate has a front entrance on the Wellingborough Road and is close to the A.45 road to Northampton.The estate is laid out as a rectangle and is used by various companies which either manufacture or supply goods to customers.The estate has over eighteen businesses,including engineering,plastics,chemicals,car repairs,electrical components,and cash_and_carry and removal companies.There is some wasteland at the back of the factory units and this is sometimes leased to other companies for storage. Mark Curtis.
